title: Big clue in Mars discovery
text:
NASA to hold urgent press conference to announce major science finding from Mars MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au NASA to hold urgent press conference to announce major science finding from Mars MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au NASA Rover Captures Blue Sunset on Mars 1:35 
NASA?s Curiosity Rover has captured images of a blue sunset on the Martian horizon. WSJ's Monika Auger reports. Photo: NASA/JPL-Caltech/MSSS/Texas A&M University May 12th 2015 5 months ago /video/video.news.com.au/Technology/ 
SPECULATION that NASA’s Curiosity Rover has found life on Mars has been thrown into overdrive with the space agency announcing an urgent press conference. 
In a press release , NASA said it would be holding a conference to detail “a major science finding from the agency’s ongoing exploration of Mars”. 
This is not the first time NASA has used a press conference to announce a groundbreaking discovery, with the space agency doing the same earlier this year to reveal it had discovered the Earth-like planet Kepler-452b. Other Stories
